snippet: Paris Saint-Germain overcame a poor first half to beat Bastia and move 6 points ahead of Lyon at the top of the French league.
abstract: Paris Saint-Germain beats Bastia, 3-1, to extend its first place lead in French league soccer.
lead_paragraph: Paris Saint-Germain overcame a poor first half to beat Bastia and move 6 points ahead of Lyon at the top of the French league.

headline.main: P.S.G. Widens Lead After Defeating Bastia
